mince.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: to cut food, especially meat, into very small pieces, usually using a machine
mince.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: Mince the meat up with some onion and garlic.
mince.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: to walk with very quick, short steps in a way that looks unnatural or silly
mince.translation[0].definitions[1].exam: She was mincing about in her high-heeled shoes.
mince.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: meat, especially beef, that has been cut into very small pieces using a special machine
